      • configureMeasures

        public static void configureMeasures(ReportSpecificationImpl spec,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> settings)
        Adds measures to the report specification based on AMP-18874: a) needs to have 'planned commitments' and 'planned disbursements' if any planned setting is selected. b) needs to have 'actual commitments' and 'actual disbursements' if any actual setting is selected. c) needs to have 'Bilateral SSC Commitments' and 'Triangular SSC Commitments' if any SSC setting is selected.
        Parameters:
        spec -
        settings -

      • applyExtendedSettings

        public static void applyExtendedSettings(ReportSpecificationImpl spec,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> settings)
        Applies common settings and other custom settings (e.g. funding type)
        Parameters:
        spec - report specification
        settings - the settings

      • getDefaultFundingType

      • applySettings

        public static void applySettings(ReportSpecificationImpl spec,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> settings,
                                 boolean setDefaults)
        Configures report specification with settings provided via Json Applies request settings, that are expected in the following format: config = { ..., “settings” : { // fields selected options or specified values "funding-type" : [“Actual Commitments”, “Actual Disbursements”], "currency-code" : “USD”, "calendar-id" : “123” "year-range" : { from : "all", to : "2014" } } }
        Parameters:
        spec - - report specification over which to apply the settings
        settings - - the settings
        setDefaults - if true, then not specified settings will be configured with defaults

      • configureYearRange

        public static void configureYearRange(ReportSettingsImpl reportSettings,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> settings,
                                      boolean setDefaults)
        Configures year range setting
        Parameters:
        reportSettings -
        settings -
        setDefaults: - if true AND there is no range setting in @reportSettings, then reportSettings will be populated with the workspace/system's default
